info.name: embed_vgg16
info.description: A module for embedding videos into the VGG-16 feature space

outputs.name: backing_dir
outputs.description: the directory to write the embeddings

parameters.name: vgg16
parameters.description: an optional VGG16FeaturizerConfig describing the VGG16Featurizer to use

parameters.name: crop_box
parameters.description: an optional region of interest to extract from each frame before embedding
